field.name: description
field.value:
Calling GetService<T> on StubMonoRailServices will generate the following exception if the service has not been registered: System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary.
GetService should return an implementation of the requested service **or null** if the service could not be resolved.
Attached patch delegates GetService<T> to GetService(Type type) which correctly returns null if there is no implementation of T registered.
Attached file has disappeared - fix is simple or I can email patch to someone.

comment.author: neal
neal
comment.text:
* '''Description''' changed from: {quote} Calling GetService<T> on StubMonoRailServices will generate the following exception if the service has not been registered: System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary.
GetService should return an implementation of the requested service **or null** if the service could not be resolved.
Attached patch delegates GetService<T> to GetService(Type type) which correctly returns null if there is no implementation of T registered. {quote} to: {quote} Calling GetService<T> on StubMonoRailServices will generate the following exception if the service has not been registered: System.Collections.Generic.KeyNotFoundException: The given key was not present in the dictionary.
GetService should return an implementation of the requested service **or null** if the service could not be resolved.
Attached patch delegates GetService<T> to GetService(Type type) which correctly returns null if there is no implementation of T registered.
Attached file has disappeared - fix is simple or I can email patch to someone. {quote}

comment.author: roelofb
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
